name: Dice: The Deliverance
description:
Take your DnD heroes (Dice&Dice characters) and battle your way through dice realm, where is never enough dices. Roll your heroic dices a combine them with your mana dices to kill monster dices to earn more dices and improve owned dices! Hm dices... Okay, let’s get serious. Slay many foes, empower yourself and bring deliverance to your realm… and dices.

 Tips:

On the map choose enemy to fight him. During fight every turn are abilities of your heroes rolled. Then there are mana dices which are also rolled and which you drag and drop onto heroes to fuel their abilities. Then press Fight! Each sides attack is lowered by opposing side defense. Excess attack causes loss of lives for the monster and loss of your mana dices. Beware: when you lose all of your mana dices you also lose the combat. For every combat you got points which you can spend in shop for upgrades – better mana dices and better heroes.

 Known bugs:

  • Sometimes hero actions are not displayed but they work correctly and you can still see total stats in the bottom bar.
